name: SCNVector4
desc: A representation of a four-component vector.

items.name: var x: Float
items.desc: The first component in the vector.

items.name: var y: Float
items.desc: The second component in the vector.

items.name: var z: Float
items.desc: The third component in the vector.

items.name: var w: Float
items.desc: The fourth component in the vector.

items.name: init(x: CGFloat, y: CGFloat, z: CGFloat, w: CGFloat)
init(x: Float, y: Float, z: Float, w: Float)
func SCNVector4Make(Float, Float, Float, Float) -> SCNVector4
items.desc: Returns a new four-component vector created from individual component values.

items.name: func SCNVector4FromGLKVector4(GLKVector4) -> SCNVector4
items.desc: Returns a four-element SceneKit vector structure corresponding to a GLKit vector structure.

items.name: func SCNVector4ToGLKVector4(SCNVector4) -> GLKVector4
items.desc: Returns a four-element GLKit vector structure corresponding to a SceneKit vector structure.

items.name: func SCNVector4EqualToVector4(SCNVector4, SCNVector4) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the corresponding components of two vectors are equal.

items.name: let SCNVector4Zero: SCNVector4
items.desc: The four-component vector whose every component is 0.0.
